Text:
The holidays have arrived in Midgar Kingdom. Today,
Iris and Beatrix head to the venue to participate in the
Saint Selection Ceremony. However…
A-Am I supposed to change into this outfit...?!

That's right! This outfit was specially designed just
for this event!
B-But...
Is there a problem?

Given that it's called the Saint Selection
Ceremony, I thought my outfit would be
more...dignified...

It's a beauty contest to choose the most suitable and
beautiful Santa for the holidays—hence the name
"Saint Selection Ceremony"! I think this outfit is
perfect!

(A beauty contest...? I thought it was a ceremony to
honor someone with the title of "Saint"...)
(That being said, backing out now would be—)

Oh! Having you participate is truly an honor,
Princess Iris! The entire committee is so grateful!

(...Yeah, impossible. Now that I've seen their
reaction, I can't just turn it down. That said,
this outfit is...)
Um, Princess Iris...?

I understand the purpose of the ceremony now.
However, I cannot...wear this outfit.
What?! Wh-Why not?!

I am the princess and the captain of the Crimson
Order. I can't present myself in such a cutesy and
revealing outfit. I'm sorry...
B-But...

I came in because I heard the commotion from outside.
What's going on here?

Lady Beatrix...! The outfit for the Saint Selection
Ceremony is not what I expected at all...

My apologies. We should have confirmed the design
with you beforehand.
In that case, would you like to exchange outfits?
What? Are you sure?
Sure. I don't mind what I wear.
Well then—

What's the matter? Why are you staring at me like
that?
...Thanks for your generous offer, but I'll pass.
Hmm? I don't quite get it, but suit yourself.
Then please wear your original outfit...!

No, I can't do that either. I'm sorry, but I can't
wear this outfit.

As someone in a position of authority, I can't be
seen in something so cutesy and revealing...

Is a princess not allowed to wear cute and
revealing outfits?

...It's just not dignified. Besides, I worry about
what others might think...

Of course, what one considers shameful varies from
person to person. Some might feel they can't wear
revealing clothes due to their pride.

But when it comes to how the public sees you, I think
the answer is clear.
What's that supposed to mean...?

Do you think your people and the knights who look up
to you will abandon you just for wearing this outfit?
W-Well...!

...You're right, Lady Beatrix. I wasn't putting my
faith in those who believe in me...
I...will change into this outfit!

Thank you so much! I'll come back later to check on
you. Please get changed!

And so, Iris and Beatrix change into their Santa
outfits. However...
Ohh... This outfit really is a bit too much...

Really? I might not get all the intricacies of fancy
outfits, but I think it looks good on you.
D-Do you really think so...?

If you lack confidence, why not imagine all the
people who'll admire you wearing it?
Imagine them? I guess I could try...
I-I can't do it!
Hmm. It's that bad, huh...

Forget being the princess or the captain of the
Crimson Order. I-It's...embarrassing as a woman!
...Heheh. How amusing.
Wh-What's so funny...?

So long as you're given a sword, you always look so
brave and dignified in front of the public.

Yet, just a change in outfit transforms you into a
bashful damsel.
A-A damsel...?

I-I can't go out on stage like this! If I could at
least wear a coat...!

If you do that, no one will see the beautiful outfit
you're wearing. That'll be a shame.
Lady Beatrix...?!

I'm sure everyone wants to see their Princess Iris in
that outfit, so I'm confiscating your coat.
P-Please, I'm begging you! Give it back...!

Beatrix mercilessly removes her coat, leaving the
helpless Iris bright red with embarrassment.
